document_data.name: Roaringcrest
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20180313201211/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_010203-05.htm| title = So Saith Ed Jan â€“ Mar 2005| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Roaringcrest''' was a ruined keep once used by pirates on the isle of [[Raerest]] in [[Sea of Swords]], just off the shores of [[Candlekeep]].
document_data.Location: Roaringcrest built on a natural harbor on Raerest's southeastern side, on the southern shores of the island's freshwater lake chain.
document_data.Structure: By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Roaringcrest was a ruin reclaimed by vegetation.
document_data.History: Long time before the late 14{{th}} century DR, Roaringcrest was a pirate stronghold, until its destruction at the hands of the [[Twilight Three]], a trio of [[lich]]es from the isle of [[Thelve]]. The liches pelted the keep with spells that turned it into an area of ''[[wild magic]]''. After the pirate occupants, the ruins were home to [[crimson death]]s, [[darktentacles]] and [[automaton]]s. Even by the late 14{{th}} century DR, pirates of the Sea of Swords told stories of ancient buccaneer treasures hidden within Roaringcrest.
